feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:13 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 5:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow after midnight. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near noon then clearing. Blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
